heading: Diablo 4 Alt Leveling, Ball Lightning & Meteor Sorcerer Endgame Build Guides are Live!
content: We've published a new guide to help people level their alt characters efficiently as well as 2 new builds guides!. Below you can check out the . Coming soon we have: If you aren't prepared and don't have a plan, alt character leveling can be a drag. The best strategies involve completing your renown on your main character while stashing items, to use on your alt leveling journey. Jump into our to learn some of the tips and tricks to get your all of your alternate characters to high levels fast! Sorcerer has good single target damage and decent AoE coverage, making it a great speedfarming build while also getting you reasonably far into . The main downsides of this build are its melee range, lack of burst damage, and the unfortunate interaction with walls ( disappear). Sorcerer doesn't produce very impressive damage numbers; you will never see a million on your screen. However, the sheer amount of the damage numbers more than compensates for that and, at times, it gets so ridiculous that you have to go and disable them in settings. The goal of the Sorcerer is to rain fiery impending doom and destruction on anything in its path, and to look good doing it. While it is currently not the strongest skill the Sorcerer has at its disposal, is more than capable of doing all endgame content with its above average base skill damage and more importantly, its stylish visuals. We'll be doing a lot of updates and new builds over the next few weeks as we wait for Season 1 to arrive. We're continuing to work on our world map tool and are excited to release that in the near future along with more quality of life updates for ! More news coming this week stay tuned! If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Sanctuary here we come!
